title: Life insurance policies (term, whole, universal)
dataVerified: Insured name, date of birth, beneficiaries, coverage amount, premium, underwriting class, policy date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged life insurance policies. Domain binding verifies insurer. Extremely long policy lifetime (decades). Beneficiary verification at death. Estate planning reliance. Multi-page policy with riders benefits from per-page verification to prevent tampering with beneficiary designations or coverage amounts. Critical for estate settlement where policy authenticity determines death benefit payment.
